title: Troll
description:
A green troll, usually shown holding a club.

May be used to refer to the fantasy creature. May also be used to refer to an internet troll or the act of trolling.

Apple’s troll holds a scepter instead of a club. Microsoft, Twitter, and WhatsApp's designs show only the bust of a troll instead of the full-bodied creature.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's troll emoji is a whimsical and slightly mischievous character, presented with a vibrant green complexion and prominent horns, all rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and playful lighting. The wide, knowing grin and slightly furrowed brow suggest a creature of folklore, often associated with trickery or playful disruption, but on Apple devices, it carries a lighthearted, fun-loving tone. Its rounded, smooth edges and detailed textures make it a visually engaging element in digital conversations.
